column4: Is there a manual command to change the resolution on xorg?  Im stuck in 640x480 with no way to change it through the GUI.
Is there a manual command to change the resolution on xorg?  Im stuck in 640x480 with no way to change it through the GUI.
I have it open, what exactly do I change?
I can explain, or I can send a link to a guide... I suggest the latter.
follow the guide, and tell me how it goes
open a terminal and run < sudo cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf.bak >
that makes a backup of the file. Then follow the guide.
ok, now follow the guide, it's got some good info.
